>Practice it a bit at first. If you miss and don't drop the
>item in the right place on the slot, the item falls to the
>ground so it pays (literally) to learn how to do it right.
>Positioning the upper-left corner of the item in the middle of
>the slot seems to work best. I still drop things sometimes,
>and believe me your heart skips a beat when you drop a combine
>longsword. :-)
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...

I found a quicker, easier way of placing an item that is currently on your
cursor (sword, shield, instrument) into your character's hand. Just click on
your picture while in the inventory screen - the item is automatically
placed onto your body (this works for ALL held or worn items). I used to
speed-loot my corpse this way when i needed to, and also switch between
weaps and instruments.

Sartori of Kelethin
